sentences.english: This paper will discuss the tomb and the kirmess.
sentences.chinese: 本文將圍繞堯陵及堯陵廟會展開論述。

sentences.english: In his late years, he demised his position to Sage Shun, who had more abilities than him.
sentences.chinese: 堯的晚年把盟主的位置讓給比自己更有才華的舜。

sentences.english: You say that you are the Yao righteousness company, Sun Jia, of country's Di, I also believe you.
sentences.chinese: 你說你是堯國義商孫家的嫡孫，我也信你。

sentences.english: Why does he carry out the policy of benevolence?To me, it is totally unnecessary.
sentences.chinese: 因此，照我看，堯費力的推行仁政根本就是多餘之舉。

sentences.english: All eyes were bent on Chen Yaozi.
sentences.chinese: 所有目光都集中在陳堯諮身上。

sentences.english: However GM said that Yew Chung might not be able to pass this calamity this time.
sentences.chinese: 但師佛卻表示堯中師兄可能過不了這次的災難了。

sentences.english: I am going to introduce Yao Ming today, he is my favourite basketball player.
sentences.chinese: 我要介紹堯眯嗯今天，他是我最喜歡的籃球運動員。

sentences.english: From then on, Chen Yaozi became a very humble archer.
sentences.chinese: 從此，陳堯諮變得非常謙虛。

sentences.english: In Yao's governance, he made people love each other and have close relationship.
sentences.chinese: 在堯治理天下時，他使百姓間團結友愛，關係密切。
